synopsis.text: Average junior high school student, Kousuke Ueki, finds himself in an extraordinary situation when a mysterious entity, known as a God Candidate, bestows upon him the unique ability to transform trash into trees. Ueki is thrust into a high-stakes tournament where junior high school students, chosen by God Candidates and imbued with special powers, battle it out to determine the next ruler of the Celestial World. The winning student is granted the Blank Talent, a reward that allows them to inscribe any ability or talent they desire. Ueki, initially disinterested in the tournament, is compelled to participate to protect himself and his friends from other power-wielding students. As he delves deeper into the competition, Ueki's sense of justice is ignited, fueling his determination to win and prevent the Blank Talent from falling into malicious hands. However, the path to victory is fraught with challenges, as Ueki must face off against opponents with formidable and bizarre abilities. Will Ueki's unique power and unwavering resolve be enough to triumph in this earth-friendly battle royale?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
